summary: Adds three rings with combined Smithing and Alchemy enchants.
descriptionHtml:
Version History:
v1.0 - Original file - see description

v1.1 - It was brought up in the comments that the rings in v1.0 are being spawned in multiple chests that are similar to the chest I originally put them in, so I added a strong box and placed it on a shelf (see screenshot).  

Description:
My first Skyrim mod.
I was tired of trying to find a lot of different Alchemy and Smithing gear in a chest full of  other gear and didn\'t want to go through the Enchanting process get them.
So I created three rings with combined Alchemy and Smithing enchantments.

They are:
Ring of Journeyman Crafting - Fortify Smithing and Alchemy 50%
Ring of Expert Crafting - Fortify Smithing and Alchemy 75%
Ring of Master Crafting - Fortify Smithing and Alchemy 100%

They are located in a chest in Dragonsreach in front of Farengar Secret-Fire\'s desk (see screenshot).

Known Issues:
-The rings are marked as stolen in the chest but not in your inventory and you can take them without anyone caring.

-If you are using the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6703]Skyrim Unlimited Rings And Amulets[/url] mod by glock9mm you can only equip one of the rings but any other rings you\'re wearing will not be unequipped.

Install/Uninstall:
Download using the Download with Manager button and activate it in the NMM 
or
Manually download the .esp file, place it in the ...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory and activate the mod in the Skyrim launcher.
Uninstall - delete the .esp from the Data directory.
author: yuckygeo
